channel.title: RuneScape - Still dealing with the simplest of bugs
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PMXQFXo.gif[/img]
Explanation: I used a thin snail on the pestle and mortar to make blamish snail slime, but instead of it removing the thin snail, it removed the "Used with" item, instead of the actual ingredient.
Too bad you don't get any exp from this. It'd be super cheap.

item.title: RuneScape - Still dealing with the simplest of bugs
item.dc:creator: @ciaran6889 ciaran6889
item.description:
@ciaran6889 wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:14, topic:550421”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=669329.msg4475899#msg4475899 date=1425879161]

Jagex has always been good at fixing bugs.

I hope that’s sarcasm.

My account is still bugged and I can’t claim a reward from Fate of the Gods.
Like 3 of my clan mates are stuck on some quests due to bugs.
Some of the bugs that exist are ridiculous.
I have a set of animations that I never even unlocked, and I can’t activate them but I apparently own them.
[/quote]

I can’t remember what quest it was, but I was stuck on it for 2 years because one of the steps was bugged.[/quote]

I remember I was stuck on the quest shilo village for two years because of some stupid bug involving beads of the dead. It was quite annoying at the time

Read full topic
item.source: RuneScape - Still dealing with the simplest of bugs

Jagex has always been good at fixing bugs.

Some of the bugs that exist are ridiculous.

MMO’s specifically.

item.title: RuneScape - Still dealing with the simplest of bugs
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Loveandpower:

then don’t you think you should be reporting the bug then showing it here…? They normally do a decent job of fixing stuff.

It’s already been reported. Not like I can change the speed in which they patch it.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneScape - Still dealing with the simplest of bugs

item.title: RuneScape - Still dealing with the simplest of bugs
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Mr.Draconian:

Well the problem with RuneScape is that they add content instead of fixing bugs.

They do a pretty decent job imo, I’ve not ever encountered one being apart of RuneScape (at least to my knowledge) while being apart of the game. Plus they have a team dedicated to fixing bugs and I don’t think they even let people know the full list of what was and wasn’t fixed (yet).

Read full topic
